info.title: UoA Discords API
info.description: Backend API for the Uoa Discords project.

get.description:
Checks API status, version, uptime, and other stats.

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

Returns IP address of client, useful for [configuring proxies](https://www.npmjs.com/package/express-rate-limit#:~:text=Troubleshooting%20Proxy%20Issues).

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

200.description: IP address of client, might be `::1` if viewing from same network.

get.description:
Complete Discord OAuth2 login process, returning a Discord access token.

*Permission Level: 1 (LikeDislike)*

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: OAuth2 code returned by Discord authorization endpoint.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Server-specified state returned by Discord authorization endpoint.

409.description: State doesn't match, possible CSRF attempt has occurred.

410.description: Unexpected (possibly expired) state. User likely waited too long to authorize.

get.description:
Makes and redirects to a Discord OAuth2 authorization URL.

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

_Please note that trying out this request on Swagger will not work, you should instead try it in a browser or applications like [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) and [Insomnia](https://insomnia.rest/download)._

Gets all entries of a certain state.

*Permission Level: 4 (Moderator)*

200.description: All entries of the specified state.

patch.description:
Changes the state of an entry.

*Permission Level: 4 (Moderator)*

reason.description: Reason for withdrawal or denial, if doing so.

404.description: An entry with that state and ID does not exist.

patch.description:
Changes the tags of an entry.

*Permission Level: 4 (Moderator)*

404.description: An entry with that state and ID does not exist.
An entry with that state and ID does not exist.

schema.description: User ID of the admin/owner of the opt-out guild who requested the opt-out.

404.description: An opt-out guild with that ID does not exist.

patch.description:
Likes, dislikes, or removes a like/dislike of an entry.

*Permission Level: 1 (LikeDislike)*

404.description: An approved entry with that ID does not exist.

patch.description:
Modifies the permission level of a user.

*Permission Level: 5 (Admin)*

404.description: A user with that ID does not exist.

get.description:
Gets pending applications of current user.

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

200.description: Array of pending applications made by the client.

get.description:
Gets this document! Note that this is the only endpoint that is not ratelimited.

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

Gets a list of all staff members.

*Permission Level: 0 (None)*

200.description: List of moderators, admins, and owners.

LoginResponse.description: Object returned from a successful login or refresh request.

siteAuth.description: JsonWebToken to use for any elevated requests to this API.

AccessTokenResponse.description: Object returned from a Discord OAuth2 token routes, see the official [Discord API docs](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/oauth2#authorization-code-grant-access-token-response) for more info.

expires_in.description: How long, in seconds, until the returned access token expires.

SiteUser.description: Some of the user data stored on the server, the first 5 properties are from the [Discord API user object](https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object).

lastLogin.description: ISO timestamp of last login or refresh of this user.

applicationStats.description: Statistics of entries created by this user, always current.

BasicUserInfo.description: Basic user information, used to display a user without having to make more API calls to get their full profile (if it exists).

guildData.description: See the official [Discord API docs](https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/guild#guild-object) for more info.

items.description: Tuple of [online, total] members in the server.

longMessage.example: An invalid access_token was provided in the "Authorization" header.

fixMessage.example: Log out, then log back into the website.

Perms-RequiredLevel.description: Required permission level to do this action.

Perms-CurrentLevel.description: Current permission level of user, will be the default permission level (2) if user could not be authenticated.

429.description: Too many requests, rate limited. All endpoints give the following headers.

RateLimit-Limit.description: Maximum number of requests per time window.

RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of requests remaining in this time window.

RateLimit-Reset.description: Number of seconds until this time window ends.

Retry-After.description: Length of time window in seconds.

siteToken.description: JWT signed by server, contains Discord access token and user ID.

tags.name: Core
tags.description: Operations that can usually be done by anyone, and pertain to core site functionality.

tags.name: Entry Modification
tags.description: Operations on existing entries, most of these (besides like) require a permission level of 4 (Moderator) or above.

tags.name: Login Process
tags.description: Operations for logging in to the site via Discord. These endpoints usually require a permission level of 1 (LikeDislike) or above.

tags.name: User Management
tags.description: Operations to get all users, or modify existing users permission levels, these endpoints usually require a permission level of 5 (Admin) or above.
